sub_title: Finding the best Renewable talent for market leading EPC, Development, Utility companies in USA
summary:
Specialist in placing Construction Project Managers, Project Developers, Business Development/ Origination and Project Finance Professionals into the Renewable Energy Sector across the USA.

E : josh.rahill@amoriabond.com
T : +1 773 232 1830 

Thank you for viewing my profile. If you are viewing my profile because I have recently viewed yours, it is possible that I am interested in speaking to you regarding opportunities that I am currently recruiting for or that I have a potential candidate for your organisation.

I am a professional head-hunter for Senior opportunities in Construction Project Management, Project Development, Business Development/ Origination and Project Finance professionals in the US Renewable Power & Energy Industry. This involves technologies such as Wind, Solar and Battery Storage. Our clients include OEM's, Investment Houses, EPC firms, Utilities, IPPs, Project Developers, Engineering service and consultancies.

I place particular emphasis on creating a lasting partnership to help you achieve your business objectives by recruiting the best people for your organisation. My service involves: Retained Search, Executive Search, Senior appointments, Contingency recruitment, Advertised Recruitment campaigns, Market Mapping, Project/Interim Recruitment.

With a thorough knowledge of the Power and Energy industry and how businesses are evolving with the global energy transition, I provide my clients with an honest and realistic solution to the ongoing problems associated with staffing within the Power & Energy market.

Please feel free to join my LinkedIn network in the knowledge that my settings will allow your connection to remain confidential to other users.

Offshore Wind Energy, Onshore Wind Energy, Wind Turbine, Transmission and Distribution, Substation, Battery, Investment, Storage, BESS, Power, Overhead Line, Solar EPC, Solar Manufacturing, Solar Module, Cable EPC, Energy from Waste & Gasification, Marine Renewable Energy Technology, Utilities, CCGT, Hydrogen Plant, Plant Engineering, WtE, Oil and Gas, Refinery, Chemical, Petrochemical, LNG, High Voltage, HV, MV, LV, EPC, Sales, Head of Sales, VP Sales, SVP Sales, Senior PM, Senior Project Manager, Senior Project Developer, Senior Project Development, Origination, Project Finance
